name: Switch (Youssef_yuze)
description:
Switch is a platformer/puzzle game.

Your objective is to press the switch to open a door which will lead to your freedom, The game has currently 10 levels,  you can choose first 6 levels but the last 4 you have to play through 6 to 10.

Movement:

Arrow keys or 'A ' and 'D' for left and right / space for jump

There are three types of switches:

1- Main door switch (White) -> opens the Dark red door. 

2- Steel door switch (grey) -> opens the Steel door.

3-Invisible switch (Black) -> shows a hidden tile or a box to reach a specific goal.

Hope you enjoy it :D !! 

ps: That 's my first 2D platformer game
